TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MediaParser extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: Parses media container formats and extracts contained media samples and metadata.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Advance(class Android.Media.MediaParser/ISeekableInputReader seekableInputReader) cil managed

Docs.param: The SeekableInputReader from which to obtain the media container data.
Docs.summary: Makes progress in the extraction of the input media stream, unless the end of the input has been reached.
Docs.returns: Whether there is any data left to extract. Returns false if the end of input has been reached.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Android.Media.MediaParser Create (Android.Media.MediaParser.IOutputConsumer outputConsumer, params string[] parserNames);
.method public static hidebysig class Android.Media.MediaParser Create(class Android.Media.MediaParser/IOutputConsumer outputConsumer, string[] parserNames) cil managed

Docs.param: The OutputConsumer to which extracted data is output.
The names of the parsers to sniff the content with. If empty, a default array of names is used.
Docs.summary: Creates an instance whose backing parser will be selected by sniffing the content during the first #advance call.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Android.Media.MediaParser CreateByName (string name, Android.Media.MediaParser.IOutputConsumer outputConsumer);
.method public static hidebysig class Android.Media.MediaParser CreateByName(string name, class Android.Media.MediaParser/IOutputConsumer outputConsumer) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the parser that will be associated with the created instance.
The OutputConsumer to which track data and samples are pushed.
Docs.summary: Creates an instance backed by the parser with the given name.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<string> GetParserNames(class Android.Media.MediaFormat mediaFormat) cil managed

Docs.param: The MediaFormat to check support for.
Docs.summary: Returns an immutable list with the names of the parsers that are suitable for container formats with the given MediaFormat.
Docs.returns: The parser names that support the given mediaFormat, or the list of all parsers available if no container specific format information is provided.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.param: The name of the parameter to set. See PARAMETER_* constants for documentation on possible values.
The value to set for the given parameterName. See PARAMETER_* constants for documentation on the expected types.
Docs.summary: Sets parser-specific parameters which allow customizing behavior.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool SupportsParameter(string parameterName) cil managed

Docs.param: The parameter name to check support for. One of the PARAMETER_* constants.
Docs.summary: Returns whether the given parameterName is supported by this parser.
Docs.returns: Whether the given parameterName is supported.
